title: Nightclub owner, 2 others arrested in Greene Co. shooting
content:
GREENE COUNTY, AL (WBRC) -
Three people, including the owner of Dr. Rock’s nightclub, are in custody after a shooting incident in the early hours of Feb. 14.
Avery Lynn Hughes, 23, and LaDexter Tequan Pelt, 19, both of Eutaw, face several charges ranging from attempted murder to assault.
Percy Howard Crawford, the 75-year-old owner of the nightclub, is charged with tempering with physical evidence.
Dr. Rock’s is also known as Howard’s nightclub.
